channel.title: Json Ld on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Json Ld on Boettiger Group

item.title: JSON-LD Vita exploration
item.description: Using JSON Queries (JQ) Pure JSON vita <- readr::read_file("../../static/js/vita.json") jq(vita, '."@reverse".author[] | { year: .dateCreated, author: .author[] | [.givenName, .familyName] | join(" ") }') %>% combine() %>% fromJSON() year author 2017-12-09 Getz 2017-12-09 Marshall 2017-12-09 Carlson 2017-12-09 Giuggioli 2017-12-09 Ryan 2017-12-09 Romañach 2017-12-09 Boettiger 2017-12-09 Chamberlain 2017-12-09 Larsen 2017-12-09 D’Odorico 2017-12-09 O’Sullivan 2017-3-15 Stephanie E.
